member.name: T:ZiggyCreatures.Caching.Fusion.Plugins.StackExchangeRedisBackplane.RedisBackplaneOptions
member.summary: Represents the options available for the Redis backplane.

member.name: P:ZiggyCreatures.Caching.Fusion.Plugins.StackExchangeRedisBackplane.RedisBackplaneOptions.Configuration
member.summary: The configuration used to connect to Redis.

member.name: P:ZiggyCreatures.Caching.Fusion.Plugins.StackExchangeRedisBackplane.RedisBackplaneOptions.ConfigurationOptions
member.summary: The configuration used to connect to Redis. This is preferred over Configuration.

member.name: P:ZiggyCreatures.Caching.Fusion.Plugins.StackExchangeRedisBackplane.RedisBackplaneOptions.ChannelPrefix
member.summary:
The prefix that will be used to construct the Redis pub/sub channel name.
NOTE: if not specified, the will be used.

member.name: T:ZiggyCreatures.Caching.Fusion.Plugins.StackExchangeRedisBackplane.RedisBackplanePlugin
member.summary: A Redis based implementation of a FusionCache backplane.
Initializes a new instance of the RedisBackplanePlugin class.
member.param: The set of options to use with this instance of the backplane.
The instance to use. If null, logging will be completely disabled.
